original_text: Besides the regular burnt offering and its grain offering, you shall offer them and their drink offering. See that they are without blemish.
korean_text: 너희는 다 흠 없는 것으로 상번제와 그 소제와 전제 외에 그것들을 드릴 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Besides the regular burnt offering and its grain offering,
sentences.korean_translation: 매일 드리는 번제와 그 소제 외에도,

sentences.original_text: you shall offer them and their drink offering.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그것들과 그들의 전제를 드려야 한다.

sentences.original_text: See that they are without blemish.
